titles.title: Delight Yourself In The Lord And He Will Give You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Delight yourself in the Lord and He will give you
The desires of your heart.
Delight yourself in the Lord and He will give you
The desires of your heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My delight, Lord, is in You,
And I delight in loving You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I delight in the fact that I am Your child,
And forever I'll be,
And I delight in the fact that You are my Father
And, Lord, You love me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I love the way that You love me Lord,
How I love simply being with You.
I love the way that You stay with me,
No matter what I'm going through.
